radiographic_examinations.findings: Unremarkable lung bases and imaged portion of the cardiac apex; liver enhances homogeneously with no focal liver lesions; patent portal vein; unremarkable gallbladder with no stones or signs of cholecystitis; unremarkable spleen, pancreas, and bilateral adrenals; kidneys enhance homogeneously with no hydronephrosis, stones, or masses; no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy; unremarkable stomach and loops of small and large bowel; calcifications in the aorta; rectosigmoid colon with fat stranding and scattered diverticula; no drainable fluid collection or microperforation noted; unremarkable appendix; normal bladder and uterus; no pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy; no suspicious lytic or sclerotic lesions in bones.
